name: Alert
previewtext: You don't grant advantage vs hidden creatures, you are never surprised, and you gain +5 to initiative

name: Athlete
previewtext: You can climb at full speed, you can make a running jump after 5 feet, standing up costs you just 5 feet, and you gain +1 to either Str or Dex

name: Actor
previewtext: You gain advantage on deception and performance checks to impersonate someone else, you can imitate the sounds or speech of another creature, and you gain +1 Cha

name: Charger
previewtext: You can make a bonus action attack after dashing and can either gain +5 damage or push the target 10 feet if you moved in a straight line and 10 feet or more

name: Crossbow Expert
previewtext: You don't have disadvantage from adjacent enemies on ranged attacks, you can load crossbows faster, and you can make a bonus action attack with a hand crossbow after attacking with a one-handed weapon

name: Defensive Duelist
previewtext: You can use a reaction to gain proficiency bonus to AC when wielding a finesse weapon

name: Dual Wielder
previewtext: You can draw/stow two weapons per round, you can dual wield non-light weapons, and you gain +1 AC while dual wielding

name: Dungeon Delver
previewtext: You gain advantage on checks to find secret doors and saves vs traps, you gain resistance vs traps, and you don't need to move slowly to look for traps

name: Durable
previewtext: You always regain at least 2x Con mod from a hit die and you gain +1 Con

name: Elemental Adept
previewtext: Your spells that deal one of acid/cold/fire/lightning/thunder ignore resistance, and you can treat rolled 1s as 2s for those spells

name: Grappler
previewtext: You can restrain a grappled foe as an action, you gain advantage on attacks vs foe you grapple, and you can grapple creatures one size larger

name: Great Weapon Master
previewtext: You can make a bonus action attack after critting or killing a creature and you can take -5 to a melee attack for +10 damage

name: Healer
previewtext: You can use a healer's kit to heal a creature 1d6 + 4 hp as an action, and a dying creature you stabilize gains 1 hp

name: Heavily Armored
previewtext: You are proficient with heavy armor and you gain +1 Str

name: Heavy Armor Master
previewtext: You take 3 less bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage while in heavy armor and you gain +1 Str

name: Inspiring Leader
previewtext: You can take ten minutes to give six creatures your level + Cha temp hp once between rests

name: Keen Mind
previewtext: You can clearly recall anything seen or heard within a month, you can determine north, you know when sunrise/sunset will happen, and gain +1 to Int

name: Lightly Armored
previewtext: You are proficient with light armor and gain +1 to either Str or Dex

name: Linguist
previewtext: You know three additional languages, can create coded ciphers, and gain +1 Int

name: Lucky
previewtext: You can reroll a d20 roll you make or an attack against you 3/day

name: Mage Slayer
previewtext: You gain advantage on saves vs spells from adjacent creatures, can attack an adjacent creature who casts a spell as a reaction, and concentration checks caused by your damage have disadvantage

name: Magic Initiate
previewtext: You gain two cantrips and a first level spell which you can cast 1/day from a single spellcasting class

name: Martial Adept
previewtext: You gain a superiority die and two battle master maneuvers

name: Medium Armor Master
previewtext: Your max Dex to AC in medium armor increases to 3, and medium armor no longer causes disadvantage on stealth

name: Mobile
previewtext: You gain +10 to speed, ignore difficult terrain when you dash, and you don't provoke from creatures you've attacked that turn

name: Moderately Armored
previewtext: You are proficient with shields and medium armor, and gain +1 to either Str or Dex

name: Mounted Combatant
previewtext: You can redirect an attack against your mount to yourself, you gain advantage vs unmounted foes, and your mount gains Evasion

name: Observant
previewtext: You gain +5 to passive perception and investigation, can read lips, and gain +1 to either Int or Wis

name: Polearm Master
previewtext: You can make a bonus action attack with the shaft of a polearm dealing d4 damage after attacking with that polearm, and you can make opportunity attack with a polearm when a creature comes within reach

name: Resilient
previewtext: You gain proficiency with one save and +1 to that ability

name: Ritual Caster
previewtext: You can cast spells as rituals (see rules)

name: Savage Attacker
previewtext: You can reroll melee weapon damage 1/turn

name: Sentinel
previewtext: You stop creatures hit with opportunity attacks, ignore the disengage action, and can use a reaction to attack an adjacent creature that attacks someone else

name: Sharpshooter
previewtext: Your ranged attacks ignore � and � cover, don't have disadvantage from long range, and you can take -5 to a ranged attack for +10 damage

name: Shield Master
previewtext: You can shove with your shield as a bonus action after attacking, you gain your shield bonus to dex saves vs single target effects, and can use a reaction to not take half damage when you pass a dex save

name: Skilled
previewtext: You gain three skill or tool proficiencies

name: Skulker
previewtext: You can hide when only lightly obscured, missed attacks don't reveal you, and you can see in dim light

name: Spell Sniper
previewtext: Your spells ignore � and � cover, your ranged attack roll spells have doubled range, and you gain one attack roll cantrip (see rules)

name: Tavern Brawler
previewtext: Your unarmed strikes deal d4 damage, you are proficient in unarmed strikes and improvised weapons, can make a grapple as a bonus action after hitting with one, and +1 to either Str or Con

name: Tough
previewtext: You gain 2 extra hp per level

name: War Caster
previewtext: You gain advantage on concentration vs damage, can still cast while holding weapons, and can cast a single target 1 action spell as an opportunity attack

name: Weapon Master
previewtext: You gain four weapon proficiencies and +1 to either Str or Dex

name: Svirfneblin Magic
previewtext: You can cast disguise self, blindness/deafness, and blur 1/day, and nondetection (self only) at will

name: Bountiful Luck
previewtext: As a reaction you can give up your Lucky ability until the end of your next turn to grant a use of it to a creature within 30 feet

name: Dragon Fear
previewtext: You can use your breathe to instead frighten creatures within 30 feet for 1 minute (see rules) and +1 to Str, Con, or Cha

name: Dragon Hide
previewtext: You can use your claws as 1d4 slashing natural weapons, have a base AC of 13 without armor, and +1 to Str, Con, or Cha

name: Drow High Magic
previewtext: 1/day you can cast dispel magic and levitate, and can at will cast detect magic

name: Dwarven Fortitude
previewtext: You can spend a hit die to heal when you dodge, and +1 Con

name: Elven Accuracy
previewtext: You can reroll a Dex, Int, Wis, or Cha attack, and +1 Dex, Int, Wis, or Cha

name: Fade Away
previewtext: 1/rest you can become invisible until the end of your next turn as a reaction after taking damage, and +1 Dex or Int

name: Fey Teleportation
previewtext: 1/rest you can cast misty step, you learn the spell, you know Sylvan, and +1 to Int or Cha

name: Flames of Phlegethos
previewtext: You deal 1d4 fire damage when hit by melee and shed 30 feet of bright light after casting a fire spell, you can reroll 1s on spell fire damage rolls, and +1 Int or Cha

name: Infernal Constitution
previewtext: You have advantage vs poison, resist poison and cold, and +1 Con

name: Orcish Fury
previewtext: As a reaction you can make an attack when you prevent yourself from dropping to 0 hp, 1/rest you can roll an extra die of damage on a weapon attack, and +1 Str or Con

name: Prodigy
previewtext: You gain one language, one skill proficiency, one skill double proficiency, and one tool proficiency

name: Second Chance
previewtext: 1/combat you can make a creature you can see that hit you reroll, and +1 Dex, Con, or Cha

name: Squat Nimbleness
previewtext: You have advantage on grapple escape attempts, +5 feet to speed, gain Athletics or Acrobatics proficiency, and +1 Str or Dex

name: Wood Elf Magic
previewtext: 1/day you can cast pass without trace and longstrider, and gain a druid cantrip

name: Revenant Blade
previewtext: +1 AC with double scimitar, gain finesse, and +1 Str or Dex

name: Aberrant Dragonmark
previewtext: Can cast a sorcerer cantrip at will, sorcerer 1st lvl spell (1/day) with additional random effect (see rules), and +1 Con

name: Artificer Initiate
previewtext: You gain one artisan's tool proficiency, can cast a level 1 Artificer spell 1/day, an Artificer cantrip at will, and those spells become known to you.

name: Chef
previewtext: You can increase creature's hit dice healing by 1d8 during a short rest, can grant temp hp through cooking (see rules), gain cooking tools proficiency, and +1 to either Con or Wis

name: Crusher
previewtext: Creatures you critically bludgeon grant advantage to attackers until your next turn. You can move a creature 5 feet with a bludgeoning attack 1/turn. +1 to either Str or Con

name: Eldritch Adept
previewtext: Gain a Warlock invocation

name: Fey Touched
previewtext: Can cast a level 1 enchantment or divination spell 1/day, misty step 1/day, and those spells become known to you. +1 to Int, Wis, or Cha

name: Fighting Initiate
previewtext: You gain a Fighter fighting style

name: Gunner
previewtext: You are proficient with firearms, you don't have disadvantage when firing at adjacent targets, you can fire the same weapon more than 1/round, and +1 Dex

name: Metamagic Adept
previewtext: You gain two sorcery points and metamagic options

name: Piercer
previewtext: You can reroll a piercing damage die 1/turn, gain a die of damage when you critically pierce, and +1 to either Str or Dex

name: Poisoner
previewtext: You learn poisoner's kit proficiency, can use a bonus action to poison weapons, ignore poison resistance, and can create proficiency doses of a 2d8 dmg poison (DC 14) for 50 gold (see rules)

name: Shadow Touched
previewtext: Can cast a level 1 necromancy or illusion spell 1/day, invisibility 1/day, and those spells become known to you. +1 to Int, Wis, or Cha

name: Skill Expert
previewtext: Train an extra skill, gain expertise in a skill, and +1 to an ability score

name: Slasher
previewtext: Creatures you critically slash suffer disadvantage when attacking until your next turn. You can slow a creature by 10 feet with a slashing attack 1/turn. +1 to either Str or Dex

name: Telekinetic
previewtext: You can pull or push a creature 5 feet with your mind as a bonus action unless they make a strength save. You can cast an invisible version of mage hand with your mind.  +1 to Int, Wis, or Cha

name: Telepathic
previewtext: You can cast detect thoughts 1/day and the spell becomes known to you. You can speak directly into the mind of a creature within 60 feet. +1 to Int, Wis, or Cha

entries.name: Black
entries.previewtext:
Breath Weapon: 30 ft line of acid
Gain acid resistance

effects.featuretextwithbullet: Black Dragon
You can breathe a 30 ft line of acid (once between rests), dealing 2d6 acid damage, Dex save for half damage. DC = 8 + Con mod + prof
